title: The Houston Astros Are on the Verge of Returning to the World Series
text:
Corporate as it may feel, the new Yankee Stadium can still evoke the old one in October. It’s why the team felt the need to remind fans on the stadium video board Thursday that they would be arrested for throwing objects onto the field, as they did two nights earlier. And it’s what brought out the worst in the Houston Astros two years ago, the last time the teams met in the American League Championship Series.

They were still an ascendant team then, two weeks before they would win the World Series. In this cauldron away from...
description: The Houston Astros beat the New York Yankees, 8-3, in Game 4 of the ALCS to take 3-1 series lead.
